question: Which of the following was not a member of the Cabinet Mission?
explanation: Cabinet Mission was composed of three Cabinet Ministers of England which are : Sir Pethick Lawrence, Secretary of State for India, Sir Stafford Cripps, President of the Board of Trade and A .V Alexander, the First Lord of the Admiralty. Sir Cyril Radcliffe was appointed to chair two Boundary Commissions in June 1947 -one for Bengal and one for Punjab.
